name: smartorginaizer-main
description: to run this program you must run in the terminal of VS Code those commands : npm install node  npm install express npm install googleapis npm install cors after those run this command to start the program : node . or node index.js. afterwards you can run one of the html files and use them. please notice that once you have registred your credentials will be saved in a json file names users.json when the user is login and click on get events his events will be saved in the json file. need to be done: 1. need to handle the groups and the meeting algorithim 2. need to make the empty slots algorithim
